DOC.brief_summary: A comparative bioavailability study PCA slow release versus immediate release formulation , single dose fast healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete informed consent process culminate write informed consent subject . Males Age 1845 year Abstinence alcohol 1 week prior study Non smoking BMI > 19 < 30 No history evidence significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , hematopoietic , gastrointestinal disease , endocrine , metabolic , psychiatric psychological disorder Normal physical examination Within +/ 10 % normal value laboratory examination Subjects suffer current medical condition . Subjects smoke . Subjects drink > 20 gram alcohol per day . Subjects take prescription medication . Subjects abnormality screen blood test Known sensitivity ingredient study drug
